table.name: UP_USER
table.desc: Entries that uniquely identify a portal session for a particular user

column.name: USER_ID
column.desc: Internal sequence id of a user's portal information - unique user identifier - primary key, see UP_SEQUENCE

column.name: USER_NAME
column.desc: Authentication prinicipal - Foreign key to up_person_dir

column.name: USER_DFLT_USR_ID
column.desc: use the information from this user id as a default, that is a backup to revert to if user makes mistakes changing content or profile, and the initial layout for a user.

column.name: USER_DFLT_LAY_ID
column.desc: Portal uses the layout from this layout ID to revert back to, and the initial layout for a user.

column.name: NEXT_STRUCT_ID
column.desc: NEXT_STRUCT_ID used by the user in layout - found in up_layout_struct based on user. Each user has a seperate, unique, sequence of struct_ids

column.name: LST_CHAN_UPDT_DT
column.desc: Date time of last time channels were updated - It is set when a user adds a channel to his or her layout. The channel manager will be able to (not yet) present a list of channels added since the last time the user checked.

column.name: USER_ID
column.desc: Internal sequence id of a user's portal information - unique user identifier - primary key, see UP_SEQUENCE

column.name: LOCALE
column.desc: User's locale preference

column.name: PRIORITY
column.desc: The order of preference for this locale

column.name: OWNER
column.desc: Framework entity owner - UP_FRAMEWORK, UP_ERROR_CHAN

column.name: PRINCIPAL_TYPE
column.desc: **** Numeric value foreign key ENTITY_TYPE_ID of table UP_ENTITY_TYPE

column.name: PRINCIPAL_KEY
column.desc: **** The key of the entity represented by the principal

column.name: ACTIVITY
column.desc: Allowable activities, ex. VIEW, PUBLISH, SUBSCRIBE

column.name: TARGET
column.desc: Gives parameter name and value separated by period or text depending up owner's use

column.name: PERMISSION_TYPE
column.desc: GRANT or REVOKE (no example yet)

table.name: UP_USER_LAYOUT
table.desc: For a given user, a layout is created giving it an id and title, basing it on an initial structure id - for example a tab column versus a nested structure

column.name: LAYOUT_ID
column.desc: Layout ID is not unique to the portal but unique for a given user. It links to up_layout_struct

column.name: USER_ID
column.desc: Foreign key user_id of table up_user

column.name: LAYOUT_TITLE
column.desc: Layout title - the name of the layout in text

column.name: INIT_STRUCT_ID
column.desc: Initial structure ID - Points to the first channel/folder in the users layout and sets the start of the document tree

table.name: UP_LAYOUT_STRUCT
table.desc: Holds the order of a user's layout structure - the order in the user layout of channels subscribed to, the order of layout components (columns for example)

column.name: USER_ID
column.desc: Foreign key user_id of table up_user

column.name: LAYOUT_ID
column.desc: Foreign key layout_id of table up_user_layout and compound key

column.name: STRUCT_ID
column.desc: Struct ID is a unique number for a given user and is used by the portal for a given component (channel, column, etc) - primary key Given by next_struct_id in table up_user

column.name: NEXT_STRUCT_ID
column.desc: Struct ID that follows this ID in a list

column.name: CHLD_STRUCT_ID
column.desc: Struct ID that is a child to this ID

column.name: EXTERNAL_ID
column.desc: External ID that channel can store key for resources used by a channel instance for a user

column.name: CHAN_ID
column.desc: Channel ID if the current Struct_ID entry is a channel, then this is set to the channel id subscribed to and located at this position in the layout

column.name: NAME
column.desc: Name of this struct entry, name of tab, column, header or footer, etc

column.name: TYPE
column.desc: Used by portal to render framework channels - distinguishes structure components like tab and columns from footers, headers and channels

column.name: HIDDEN
column.desc: Set to Y if folder or channel is hidden

column.name: IMMUTABLE
column.desc: Set to Y if folder or channel cannot be moved in layout

column.name: UNREMOVABLE
column.desc: Set to Y if folder or channel cannot be unsubscribed to or removed by user

table.name: UP_LAYOUT_PARAM
table.desc: Parameters set by the user at publish time based upon the Channel Publishing Document of a channel class, see UP_CHAN_TYPE table. Optionally set at subscription time according to the values stored in table up_channel_param

column.name: USER_ID
column.desc: Foreign key user_id of table up_user

column.name: LAYOUT_ID
column.desc: Foreign key layout_id of table up_user_layout and compound key

column.name: STRUCT_ID
column.desc: Foreign key of table UP_LAYOUT_STRUCT and compound key

column.name: STRUCT_PARM_NM
column.desc: Struct parameter name - holds the parameter name as given in the CPD - foreign key of table UP_CHANNEL_PARAM

column.name: STRUCT_PARM_VAL
column.desc: Struct parameter value - holds the parameter value as entered by the user

table.name: UP_SEQUENCE
table.desc: Emulates auto-increment/sequence values for the the various uPortal tables primary keys. Not used by DBLoader.

column.name: SEQUENCE_NAME
column.desc: Name of sequence, corresponds to table name

column.name: SEQUENCE_VALUE
column.desc: Next available number

column.name: USER_ID
column.desc: Foreign key USER_ID of table up_user

column.name: PROFILE_ID
column.desc: Internal sequence id of a profile id - primary key, see UP_SEQUENCE

column.name: PROFILE_FNAME
column.desc: Persistent functional name of a user's profile - primary key

column.name: PROFILE_NAME
column.desc: Short name of profile

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.desc: Long description of profile

table.name: UP_GROUP
table.desc: Entries that uniquely identify a uPortal group

column.name: GROUP_ID
column.desc: Group ID is a unique sequence number used by the portal - primary key, see UP_SEQUENCE

column.name: CREATOR_ID
column.desc: Who created this group, foreign key USER_ID of table UP_USER

column.name: ENTITY_TYPE_ID
column.desc: The entity to be called when a member of this group, foreign key ENTITY_TYPE_ID of table UP_ENTITY_TYPE

column.name: GROUP_NAME
column.desc: Short textual name of the group for finding group

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.desc: Longer textual description of group to view a brief description of group

table.name: UP_ENTITY_TYPE
table.desc: Holds known IBasicEntity types, associating an Integer code with the name of a class.

column.name: ENTITY_TYPE_ID
column.desc: Entity type ID is an unique identifying sequence number used by the portal - primary key, see UP_SEQUENCE

column.name: ENTITY_TYPE_NAME
column.desc: Class name of entity (ex. org.jasig.portal.security.IPerson)

column.name: DESCRIPTIVE_NAME
column.desc: A name for display to end users (ex. Person)

table.name: UP_GROUP_MEMBERSHIP
table.desc: Mapping of member (that is, portal entity or group) to its containing group and flag if it is a group

column.name: GROUP_ID
column.desc: Unique group id number, key to GROUP_ID in UP_GROUP

column.name: MEMBER_SERVICE
column.desc: For a group, the name of the service of origin. For an entity, the name of this service.

column.name: MEMBER_KEY
column.desc: Key to either the entity or group, e.g., GROUP_ID in UP_GROUP, USER_NAME in UP_USER, etc.

column.name: MEMBER_IS_GROUP
column.desc: Is this member a group? T for true, F for false

table.name: UP_ENTITY_CACHE_INVALIDATION
table.desc: Each row indicates an entity that has been updated or deleted and whose cache entry is now invalid.

column.name: ENTITY_TYPE_ID
column.desc: The ID indicating the class of entity, foreign key ENTITY_TYPE_ID of table UP_ENTITY_TYPE

column.name: ENTITY_KEY
column.desc: The unique key of the entity.

column.name: INVALIDATION_TIME
column.desc: The time the entity was invalidated.

column.name: ENTITY_CACHE_ID
column.desc: The unique ID of the cache instance that wrote this invalidation.

table.name: UP_ENTITY_LOCK
table.desc: Each row represents a lock held on a portal entity on behalf of an owner.

column.name: ENTITY_TYPE_ID
column.desc: The ID indicating the class of entity, foreign key ENTITY_TYPE_ID of table UP_ENTITY_TYPE

column.name: ENTITY_KEY
column.desc: The unique key of the entity being locked.

column.name: LOCK_TYPE
column.desc: Either READ (0) or WRITE (1)

column.name: EXPIRATION_TIME
column.desc: The time the lock expires.

column.name: LOCK_OWNER
column.desc: The owner of the lock.

table.name: UP_ENTITY_PROP
table.desc: Each row represents a property of a portal entity.

column.name: ENTITY_TYPE_ID
column.desc: The ID indicating the class of entity, foreign key ENTITY_TYPE_ID of table UP_ENTITY_TYPE

column.name: ENTITY_KEY
column.desc: The unique key of the entity.

column.name: PROPERTY_NAME
column.desc: The name or key for the property

column.name: PROPERTY_VALUE
column.desc: The value of the property

column.name: LAST_MODIFIED
column.desc: The last time this property was modified.
